EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for a webinar on a new way to finance your avionics upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> WEBINAR | Alternative Methods of Investment In Your Avionics Please join us for an informative webinar as we discuss a fresh approach in financing your avionics upgrades. In this webinar, we will present the pros and cons of traditional methods of financing the purchase of your aircraft avionics and provide considerations for each to help with your decision process. We will also discuss an exciting option that we have devised to finance upgrading your equipment from single component to complete integrated flight deck.
Who should attend this webinar?
- Aircraft Owners - Dealers and Distributors
Featured Presenters:
- Sapan Shah – Senior Product Manager, BendixKing - Robert Haim – Head of Product Marketing, BendixKing
Webinar: Alternative Methods of Investment in Your Avionics
Date: May 7th, 2019
Time: 8-9 a.m. PST (11a.m.-12 p.m. EST)
REGISTER HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Alternative_Methods_of_Investment_in_Avionics.html]]>
